Tech Support Done Right

We believe in Diversity, Hustle, Teamwork & Adventure!

We are not your typical Silicon Valley Startup trying to take over the world. We simply want to provide "The Best Damn Customer Experience" you have ever received through Tech Support! We believe in Tech Diversity and are doing something about it. We love to work with people from all walks of life and understand that everyone brings something different.

We are 100% American based! Wether you call, chat or work with us remotely your support experience will always be with staff that is located here in the good ol' U.S.A.!

  • Tech Diversity 100%

  • Mac Support 95%

  • Windows Support 90%

  • Mobile Support 65%

  • WiFi Support 85%

Meet your new IT department! Call or book online 925-385-8667

Send me a tech

Oscar aka '#Codeconuts'

Founder & Developer

Oscar is a Latino Founder and Serial Entrepreneur who has worked in IT roles with Fortune 500 companies. Throughout his professional career Oscar has been involved in many technology focused businesses. He then went on to learn about web development and engineering. He spent some years with Startups, but knew his heart was always in business. In 2015, Oscar founded Gorilla Tech to bring Tech Support To Your Door. When not in the office, you can usually find him hanging with his family or at local sporting events!

Erick aka '#supportninja'

Co-Founder & Support Manager

Erick grew up in the SF Bay Area and received a BA in Sound Arts. Erick has since worked in various consulting and support roles for some really awesome companies such as the San Francisco 49ers and FitBit. Within these roles he has shaped and developed new strategies for support and customer happyness. Erick brings a logical and thoughtful approach to understanding clients. When not in the office Erick can be found playing softball or at Levi's Stadium cheering for his beloved 49ers.

Carmen aka '#socialkilla'

Social Embassador

Carmen was born and raised in San Francisco. She has a BS degree in Health & Management from Colorado State University. Carmen's unique blend of experience working for local hospitals, clinics and biotech companies is what makes her approach to customer service awesome. She truly understands customer needs and will always give you her best. She is also our company counselor since customers tend to gravitate to her for life advice! When not in the office you can find her with her family or watching hilarious videos online.

David aka '#mediaslayer'

Media Director

David is in charge of all things media. He holds a BA degree in Digital Filmmaking and has mad video skills. David has vast freelance experience as a videographer and brings that experience with him. David can turn any plain conversation into a story and loves to help our team with all of our media shenanigans. He continues to broaden his experience with web tools and is a video junkie. On his time outside of work he can be found watching classics like Star Wars or playing semi-pro football.
